Text: I haven't downloaded this yet. From what I've read, wifi isn't yet working when upgrading to Froyo. Has anybody tried this and tested the wifi on their device?

you need to be rooted... if you don't know what being rooted means... theres plenty of message boards to explain it... I haven't downloaded this torrent but I am running Froyo and have wireless tethering... maybe try and read some posts at www.mydroidworld.com
